about_the_game:
Craft your own tale in a whimsical fantasy world with Kinlings. Shape a cozy village into a charming city, attending to the needs of your beloved Kinlings and watching their unique stories unfold. Explore a vast and dynamic world, interact with diverse civilizations, and embark on epic quests for powerful artifacts. Cultivate vibrant farms, delve into perilous dungeons, and make strategic decisions that shape an ever-evolving narrative. Immerse yourself in an enchanting and immersive city builder experience, where building your own colony becomes a captivating journey of growth, connection, and endless possibilities.

Gather Resources and Build a Cozy Village


Create a warm and inviting community in Kinlings as you transform a quaint settlement into a charming city. Fulfill the needs of your beloved Kinlings, providing them with food, shelter, and a welcoming atmosphere.

  • Transform a Quaint Settlement: Begin with a humble village and guide it towards becoming a bustling metropolis.
  • Attend to your Kinling’s Needs: Fulfill the needs of your Kinlings, providing them with food, shelter, and a welcoming atmosphere.
  • Witness their Unfolding Lives: Dive into the lives of individual Kinlings as they go about their daily routines within your city.
  • Explore a Vast World: Venture beyond your city's borders to discover and unlock new resources, opportunities, and the chance to interact with diverse civilizations of different races and cultures.

What is your Story?


Shape your own Kinlings, create your people by choosing their race and their culture. Each Kinling is an individual, with their own preferences, relationships and traits. Be prepared to face the challenges of wounds, injuries, and sickness that affect their well-being and performance.

  • Shape your Kinlings: Combine different races with cultures, each impacting how your game is played. Agricultural Goblins? Of course! Naturalist Dwarves? Blasphemous, but possible!
  • Forge Relationships: Cultivate deep friendships, ignite romances, and witness the joy of your Kinlings’ starting families.
  • Unique Preferences: Discover a diverse range of passions among Kinlings. From skilled blacksmiths, farmers or intrepid adventurers.
  • Track Wounds and Illnesses: Care for your Kinlings' well-being as wounds, injuries, and sickness impact their abilities and survival.
  • Shift in Moods: Experience the emotional journey of your Kinlings as their surroundings and living conditions influence their moods, affecting their overall happiness and performance.
  • Journey of Growth: Watch your Kinlings progress from spirited younglings to capable adults and wise seniors, enriched by their life experiences.
  • Distinctive Traits: Encounter a variety of unique traits among your Kinlings, including night-owls thriving under the moon's embrace and those blessed with a resilient immune system.

Sow the Seeds for Future Generations


Establish thriving farms to cultivate an array of fruits and vegetables, ensuring a nutritious supply for your community. Tame a wide variety of creatures, some of which can even become loyal and cherished pets.

  • Cultivate Vibrant Farms: Create fertile fields to grow a range of fruits and vegetables.
  • Biome-Specific Crops: Venture into different biomes to uncover crops and creatures.
  • Tame Animals and Pets: Embrace the companionship of both traditional livestock and fantastical creatures like slimes, some of which can become loyal pets enriching your settlement.
  • Kinling Caretakers: Observe the dedicated efforts of your Kinlings as they tend to your crops and animals, nurturing their growth and well-being with a nutritious diet.

A Dynamic and Reactive World


Your Kinlings are not alone! There is a vast world out there! Claim land for your nation, trade with your allies, defend against your enemies. Global events will occur that can change the very face of the world.

  • A New World with Every Game: Explore the world you live in and discover new inhabitants.
  • Rich Biomes: Each biome offers unique resources; expand your territory by establishing outposts and harvesting precious materials for your home city.
  • Diplomatic Relations: Forge alliances, establish trade routes, and welcome new races through migration treaties to strengthen your nation.
  • Epic Catastrophes: Brace for major global events during your playthrough, embarking on unique quest-lines that may shape the world's destiny forever.

Embark on Adventures


Train your favorite…or most expendable Kinlings into Adventurers! As your city flourishes, you will unveil new classes for their progression. Form a party, and explore dungeons, and undertake quests for powerful items, trophies and lost knowledge.

  • Adventurers Assemble: Train Kinlings to become skilled adventurers, preparing them for exciting quests instead of village duties.
  • Unlock New Classes: Progress your city and unlock unique classes with special abilities, adding variety to your gameplay.
  • Delicious Loot: Embark on epic quests and bring home powerful artifacts capable of empowering your villagers or adventurers. Earn prestigious trophies to display in your city. Find valuable treasure to enhance your economy. Unearth lost knowledge to unlock new and innovative technologies.
  • Dungeon Delving: Explore procedural and hand-crafted dungeons, battle monsters, and save the world from disaster!

name: Kinlings

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Craft your tale in a whimsical fantasy world. Shape a charming city, fulfill Kinlings' needs, and watch their unique stories unfold. Explore, quest, farm, and build. Experience the enchantment of Kinlings.
